caption.title: Transition probability matrices for CMIP5 models and the NCEP/NCAR reanalysis.
caption.p: Rows sum up to a 100%. The synoptic systems are RSTs, PTs, Highs (H), CLs, and SLs. The numerical values of the matrices are shown in table S4. ( A) CANESM, ( B) CCSM4, ( C) HadGEM2CC, ( D) HadGEM2ES, ( E) NCEP/NCAR reanalysis, ( F) IPSL, ( G) MPI, ( H) MRI, and ( I) NORESM.
